pullRequest.title: Migrate end event processor
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Implements the new end event processor replacing the old handler.
Related issues
closes #4471

nodes.bodyText: Here, we bind the processor only for end events that have an event definition but not for the none end event.
We should add a comment on why we don't perform any state transition. It may not be obvious that the error catch can only be caught by an interrupting boundary event or event sub-process.
I would prefer to pass the whole context in like we do in other places. I think that the context is safer than passing just a long value in it.

commit.message:
chore(engine): migrate end event processor

chore(engine): remove unused code

chore(engine): use endeventprocessor for all types of end events

not only for error end event

chore(engine): apply review comments
